description:
Course Updated 22 January 2016

Why are 16,560 students wanting me to mentor them in 37 Udemy courses? 16,560 students have started learning from me since August 7th 2015. Shouldn't you find out why?

We are living in a fast changing world. To prevent being made obsolete, there is a desperate need for creative thinking.

In this course you will learn how to become a Creative Thinker. You will discover why Creative Thinking is essential and why employers value this so much in this age of disruption.

You will learn the benefits of creative thinking and why it can be incredibly lucrative and profitable.

You will also discover a process of creative thinking and learn from a number of examples.

You will be introduced to a 4 step creative thinking technique that will forever change your way of thinking.

This course comes with a 30 day money back guarantee so enroll today and start your own creative thinking.
title: Creative Thinking: For Profit And For A Changing World
